# UIFocusItemDeferralMode | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ UIKit ](/documentation/uikit)

- [ UIFocusItemDeferralMode ](/documentation/uikit/uifocusitemdeferralmode)

-  UIFocusItemDeferralMode 

Enumeration# UIFocusItemDeferralMode

iOS 18.0+iPadOS 18.0+Mac Catalyst 18.0+tvOS 18.0+visionOS 2.0+

```
enum UIFocusItemDeferralMode
```

## [Topics](/documentation/uikit/uifocusitemdeferralmode#topics)

### [Enumeration Cases](/documentation/uikit/uifocusitemdeferralmode#Enumeration-Cases)

[`case always`](/documentation/uikit/uifocusitemdeferralmode/always)Always defer focus for this item, even if deferral is disabled right now. This means a programmatic update to this item would result in focus disappearing until the user interacts with the focus engine again.[`case automatic`](/documentation/uikit/uifocusitemdeferralmode/automatic)Use the system default behavior.[`case never`](/documentation/uikit/uifocusitemdeferralmode/never)Never defer focus for this item. When a programmatic focus update lands on this item, it will always be and appear focused even if focus deferral is currently enabled.### [Initializers](/documentation/uikit/uifocusitemdeferralmode#Initializers)

[`init?(rawValue: Int)`](/documentation/uikit/uifocusitemdeferralmode/init(rawvalue:))## [Relationships](/documentation/uikit/uifocusitemdeferralmode#relationships)
